definition: to twist (strands into a thread)/to entangle/to wring/to hang (by the neck)/to turn/to wind/classifier for skeins of yarn
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: Remove the front cover of the drawworks.
The front drawworks guard should be put back in place when the operation is completed.
sentences.chinese: 作业结束之后，要尽快把绞车前边的护罩装回原处。

sentences.english: The container is winched off the ground.
Manually reeve 6 wraps of the 1 inch manila rope onto the drawworks drum.
sentences.chinese: 把一寸的棕绳在绞车辊筒上缠六圈。

sentences.english: When all personnel are ready, the driller engages the drawworks in forward drive and starts reeving in the new drilling line.
sentences.chinese: 人员都就位后，司钻启动绞车正转，开始缠新大绳。

sentences.english: We had the winch overhauled last year.
sentences.chinese: 去年我们对绞车大修过一次。

sentences.english: Remove the front guard cover of the drawworks.
Install the front drawworks guard cover after the mast is raised.
sentences.chinese: 井架起来之后，把绞车前边的护罩装上。

sentences.english: A hoisting drum is used in the drawworks of a drilling or workover rig.
sentences.chinese: 在钻机或修井作业机的绞车中使用提升滚筒。

sentences.english: The paper introduces the consolidation method and its technical parameters of the underground winch basement in Xieli coalmine.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了谢李矿井下绞车基础的加固方法和技术参数。

sentences.english: The driller also operates the drawworks brake using a long-handled lever.
sentences.chinese: 司钻同样操作绞车的刹车使用一个长的手柄。

sentences.english: What class of performance do these winches have?
sentences.chinese: 这些绞车有哪方面的性能？

sentences.english: Then operate the winch in haul-in direction and then in payout direction"."
sentences.chinese: 然后操作绞车的收揽和放揽指令。

sentences.english: In the waste dump, the Abstract is linked with the winch working Laoqin drivers turn waste rock.
sentences.chinese: 在矸石山下，摘挂工老秦正配合着绞车司机在翻矸石。

sentences.english: Winch motors of No. 1 derrick operational in 30minutes.
sentences.chinese: 不，1舱的绞车电机不能工作。

sentences.english: This allows you to use the Winches here.
sentences.chinese: 这可以让你用绞车在这里。

definition: rope tackle hanging from a mast/crow foot (system of ropes through tackle to hold up an awning)
aerial work platform (e.g. cherry picker or scissor lift)/lift/elevator
